events.name: Singapore PHP User Group Meetup (Aug 2015)
events.description:
Venue: PayPal Singapore @ Suntec City Tower 5
Address: Suntec City, 5 Temasek Blvd, #07-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985

Topics:
======
1) Developing scalable PHP apps on AWS
Speaker: Lalit Nama

Starting with introduction of AWS SDK for PHP including how to install and configure the SDK and how to perform operations with S3, I would like to cover Amazon S3 Stream Wrapper for PHP. Configuration of Amazon SES for faster emailing. Leveraging AWS services for application components. A short demo to deploy a scalable sample PHP application on AWS.

2) Introduction to Xdebug
Speaker: Claudio Michael Mettler

This will be a short talk on xdebug, how to set it up quickly.

3) Strategies for an evergreen PHP
Speaker: Kai Hendry

How do you keep PHP up to date? Do you know the version of PHP you are running even?

Since VPSes like Droplets & EC2 instances have replaced shared hosting services of the past, how do you manage your production PHP install? Lets discuss the solutions!

4) PHP 7
Speaker: Pasindu De Silva

The topic says it all - are you ready for the newest bad boy on the block? PHP 7-RC1 is dropping very soon, find out what's new and what you need to do to get ready for it.

Call for speakers:
===============
Email mcheng.work@gmail.com with the subject: "I want to speak!"

----------------------------------------------
Venue & Food Sponsor: 

PayPal Singapore

events.name: JS Beginner Study Group
events.description: - The purpose of this study group is for learning JS at your own pace, by working through resources, sharing and discussion - We do not host any talks or courses Please bring in any material or questions that you might like to go through with the group. If you would like to work on your own practical projects or online resources, feel free to do so. **DON'T FORGET to bring your laptops!! **Join our chat channel: #milo-dinosaur on Kopi.JS Slack - http://kopijs.herokuapp.com/ More info on this week's venue: Auston Institute is location within the Church of Our Lady of Lourdes (go to the side building from the carpark). The room is on the 3rd floor.
events.location: Auston Institute, 50 Ophir Road, Level 3, Room 3-5, Singapore

events.name: Git Meetup 0.3.0
events.description:
It's high time we had our third meetup! This meetup is aimed at both beginners and people who have over 11 years of Git experience (wait a minute…). We hope to stretch your Gitability level, and better your understanding of version control systems! 


Programme: - “Lessons learned from taking a product from closed to open source": Jason Pang - "Working with Git Trees": Eric Ng - "Your Git history sucks": Rahul AG Come merge with your fellow Gits! Interested in speaking? Please talk to Valentine or ChernJie! (We're looking for lightning talks!) 


Venue and food sponsor: Amazon Web Services (thanks guys!) 


Address: Amazon Web ServicesLevel 10, Capital Square23 Church StreetSingapore[masked]
events.location: Amazon Web Services Singapore, #10-01, 23 Church Street, Singapore 049481
